text: The Grand Parade is a 1930 American drama film directed by Fred C. Newmeyer and starring Helen Twelvetrees, Fred Scott and Richard Carle.Kennedy p.306 It is now considered to be a lost film. A struggling minstrel show entertainer's life is turned around by the young woman who cares for him. ==Cast== * Helen Twelvetrees as Molly * Fred Scott as Kelly * Richard Carle as Rand * Marie Astaire as Polly * Russ Powell as Calamity Johnson * Bud Jamison as Honey Sullivan * Jimmie Adams as Jones * Lillian Leighton as Madam Stitch * Spec O'Donnell as Call Boy * Sammy Blum as Sam * Tom Malone as Dougherty * Jimmy Aubrey as The Drunk ==References== ==Bibliography== * Kennedy, Matthew. Edmund Goulding's Dark Victory: Hollywood's Genius Bad Boy. Terrace Books, 2004. ==External links== * Category:1930 films Category:1930 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Fred C. Newmeyer Category:Films made before the MPAA Production Code Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Grand Parade
